00024   int regularGrid2Octree(const std::vector<double>& elementValues,
00025       unsigned int N, unsigned int nx, unsigned int ny, unsigned int nz,
00026       unsigned int xs, unsigned int ys, unsigned int zs, std::vector<TreeNode>& linOct,
00027       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth, double thresholdFac, MPI_Comm comm) {
00028     PROF_RG2O_BEGIN
00029 
00030       int rank;
00031     int npes;
00032     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00033     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00034 
00035     const int MIN_GRAIN_SIZE = 10;
00036 
00037     bool isNvalid = binOp::isPowerOfTwo(N);
00038 
00039     assert(isNvalid);
00040 
00041     unsigned int rgLevel = binOp::fastLog2(N);
00042     unsigned int elemLen = (1u << (maxDepth - rgLevel));
00043 
00044     //1. Convert input to regular octree.
00045     std::vector<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> > tmpList(nx*ny*nz);
00046 
00047     for(int k = 0; k < nz; k++) {
00048       for(int j = 0; j < ny; j++) {
00049         for(int i = 0; i < nx; i++) {
00050           unsigned int currX = ((i + xs)*elemLen); 
00051           unsigned int currY = ((j + ys)*elemLen); 
00052           unsigned int currZ = ((k + zs)*elemLen);
00053           unsigned int idx = ((nx*(j + (ny*k))) + i);
00054           tmpList[idx].node = ot::TreeNode(currX, currY, currZ, rgLevel, dim, maxDepth);
00055           tmpList[idx].values[0] = elementValues[idx];
00056         }//end for i
00057       }//end for j
00058     }//end for k
00059 
00060     //2. Convert to Morton Ordering
00061     std::vector<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> > tnAndValsList;
00062     par::sampleSort<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tmpList, tnAndValsList, comm);
00063     tmpList.clear();
00064 
00065     DendroIntL inSz = tnAndValsList.size();
00066     DendroIntL globInSize;
00067     par::Mpi_Allreduce<DendroIntL>(&inSz, &globInSize, 1, MPI_SUM, comm);
00068 
00069     bool repeatLoop = true;
00070     int npesCurr = npes;
00071     MPI_Comm commCurr = comm;
00072     if(globInSize < (MIN_GRAIN_SIZE*npes)) {
00073       int splittingSize = (globInSize/MIN_GRAIN_SIZE); 
00074       if(splittingSize == 0) {
00075         splittingSize = 1; 
00076       }
00077 
00078       unsigned int avgLoad = (globInSize/splittingSize);
00079       int leftOvers = (globInSize - (splittingSize*avgLoad));
00080 
00081       if(rank >= splittingSize) {
00082         par::scatterValues<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, tmpList, 0, commCurr);
00083       }else if(rank < leftOvers) {
00084         par::scatterValues<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, tmpList, (avgLoad + 1), commCurr);
00085       }else {
00086         par::scatterValues<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, tmpList, avgLoad, commCurr);
00087       }
00088       tnAndValsList = tmpList;
00089       tmpList.clear();
00090 
00091       MPI_Comm newComm;
00092       par::splitCommUsingSplittingRank(splittingSize, &newComm, commCurr);
00093       commCurr = newComm;
00094       npesCurr = splittingSize;
00095 
00096       if(rank >= splittingSize) {
00097         repeatLoop = false;
00098       }
00099     } else {
00100       par::partitionW<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, NULL, comm);
00101     }
00102 
00103     if(globInSize < MIN_GRAIN_SIZE) {
00104       repeatLoop = false; 
00105     }
00106 
00107     while(repeatLoop) {
00108 
00109       inSz = tnAndValsList.size();
00110 
00111       assert(inSz >= MIN_GRAIN_SIZE);
00112 
00113       MPI_Request requests[4];
00114 
00115       //Send first 7 to previous processor
00116       //Send last 7 to next processor
00117       ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> prevOcts[7];
00118       if( rank ) {
00119         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(prevOcts, 7, (rank - 1), 
00120             1, commCurr, &(requests[0]));
00121       }
00122 
00123       ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> nextOcts[7];
00124       if( rank < (npesCurr - 1) ) {
00125         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(nextOcts, 7, (rank + 1),
00126             1, commCurr, &(requests[1]));
00127       }
00128 
00129       if( rank ) {
00130         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >((&(*(tnAndValsList.begin()))), 7,
00131             (rank - 1), 1, commCurr, &(requests[2]));
00132       }
00133 
00134       if( rank < (npesCurr - 1) ) {
00135         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >((&(*(tnAndValsList.end() - 7))), 7,
00136             (rank + 1), 1, commCurr, &(requests[3]));
00137       }
00138 
00139       MPI_Status statuses[4];
00140 
00141       if( rank ) {
00142         MPI_Wait(&(requests[0]), &(statuses[0]));
00143         MPI_Wait(&(requests[2]), &(statuses[2]));
00144       }
00145 
00146       if( rank < (npesCurr - 1) ) {
00147         MPI_Wait(&(requests[1]), &(statuses[1]));
00148         MPI_Wait(&(requests[3]), &(statuses[3]));
00149       }
00150 
00151       //Check and coarsen
00152       int idxOfPrevFC = -1;
00153       if( rank ) {
00154         for(int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
00155           //There may be more than 1 FC, we only need the last one here
00156           if(prevOcts[i].node.getChildNumber() == 0) {
00157             idxOfPrevFC = i;
00158           }
00159         }//end for i
00160       }
00161 
00162       int idxOfNextFC = -1;
00163       if( rank < (npesCurr - 1) ) {
00164         for(int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
00165           //There may be more than 1 FC, we only need the first one here
00166           if(nextOcts[i].node.getChildNumber() == 0) {
00167             idxOfNextFC = i;
00168             break;
00169           }
00170         }//end for i
00171       }
00172 
00173       int myFirstFC = -1;
00174       for(int i = 0; i < inSz; i++) {
00175         if(tnAndValsList[i].node.getChildNumber() == 0) {
00176           myFirstFC = i;
00177           break;
00178         }
00179       }//end for i
00180 
00181       int myLastFC = -1;
00182       if( myFirstFC >= 0 ) {
00183         for(int i = (inSz - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
00184           if(tnAndValsList[i].node.getChildNumber() == 0) {
00185             myLastFC = i;
00186             break;
00187           }
00188         }//end for i
00189       }
00190 
00191       //Process upto myFirstFC (exclusive)
00192       //Note, we check the threshold on both the processors so that the
00193       //partition is not changed unnecessarily. 
00194       if( (myFirstFC >= 0) && (idxOfPrevFC >= 0) ) {
00195         int fcGap = (myFirstFC + 7 - idxOfPrevFC);
00196         if( fcGap < 8 ) {
00197           //Can not coarsen
00198           if(myFirstFC) {
00199             tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin(),
00200                 tnAndValsList.begin() + myFirstFC);
00201           }
00202         } else {
00203           //fcGap >= 8
00204           //Can coarsen upto (excluding) (1 + idxOfPrevFC) 
00205           double minVal = prevOcts[idxOfPrevFC].values[0];
00206           double maxVal = prevOcts[idxOfPrevFC].values[0];
00207           for(int i = idxOfPrevFC; i < 7; i++){
00208             double currVal = prevOcts[i].values[0];
00209             if(currVal < minVal) {
00210               minVal = currVal;
00211             }
00212             if(currVal > maxVal) {
00213               maxVal = currVal;
00214             }
00215           }//end for i
00216           for(int i = 0; i < (1 + idxOfPrevFC); i++){
00217             double currVal = tnAndValsList[i].values[0];
00218             if(currVal < minVal) {
00219               minVal = currVal;
00220             }
00221             if(currVal > maxVal) {
00222               maxVal = currVal;
00223             }
00224           }//end for i
00225           if((maxVal - minVal) >= thresholdFac) {
00226             //Can't coarsen
00227             if(myFirstFC) {
00228               tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin(),
00229                   tnAndValsList.begin() + myFirstFC);
00230             }
00231           } else {
00232             //Can coarsen. The previous processor will add the parent
00233             if((1 + idxOfPrevFC) < myFirstFC) {
00234               tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + (1 + idxOfPrevFC), 
00235                   tnAndValsList.begin() + myFirstFC);
00236             }//if to skip equality
00237           }//end check threshold
00238         }//end check fcGap
00239       } else {
00240         if(myFirstFC >= 0) {
00241           //Can not coarsen
00242           //The prev processor has no FC. Since the prev processor has more
00243           //than 8 elements, our elements will remain.  
00244           if(myFirstFC) {
00245             tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin(),
00246                 tnAndValsList.begin() + myFirstFC);
00247           }
00248         } else if (idxOfPrevFC >= 0) {
00249           //Can coarsen upto (excluding) (1 + idxOfPrevFC) 
00250           double minVal = prevOcts[idxOfPrevFC].values[0];
00251           double maxVal = prevOcts[idxOfPrevFC].values[0];
00252           for(int i = idxOfPrevFC; i < 7; i++){
00253             double currVal = prevOcts[i].values[0];
00254             if(currVal < minVal) {
00255               minVal = currVal;
00256             }
00257             if(currVal > maxVal) {
00258               maxVal = currVal;
00259             }
00260           }//end for i
00261           for(int i = 0; i < (1 + idxOfPrevFC); i++){
00262             double currVal = tnAndValsList[i].values[0];
00263             if(currVal < minVal) {
00264               minVal = currVal;
00265             }
00266             if(currVal > maxVal) {
00267               maxVal = currVal;
00268             }
00269           }//end for i
00270           if((maxVal - minVal) >= thresholdFac) {
00271             //Can't coarsen.
00272             tmpList = tnAndValsList;
00273           } else {
00274             //Can coarsen. The previous processor will add the parent 
00275             tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + (1 + idxOfPrevFC), 
00276                 tnAndValsList.end());
00277           }
00278         } else {
00279           //Can not coarsen
00280           tmpList = tnAndValsList;
00281         }
00282       }
00283 
00284       //Process myFirstFC (inclusive) to myLastFC (exclusive)
00285       int prevFCidx = myFirstFC;
00286       for(int idx = myFirstFC + 1; idx <= myLastFC; idx++) {
00287         if(tnAndValsList[idx].node.getChildNumber() == 0) {
00288           int fcGap = (idx - prevFCidx);
00289           if(fcGap < 8) {
00290             //Can't coarsen
00291             tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + prevFCidx,
00292                 tnAndValsList.begin() + idx);
00293           } else {
00294             //fcGap >= 8
00295             //Can coarsen upto (excluding) (8 + prevFCidx)
00296             double minVal = tnAndValsList[prevFCidx].values[0];
00297             double maxVal = tnAndValsList[prevFCidx].values[0];
00298             double sumVal = 0;
00299             for(int j = prevFCidx; j < (8 + prevFCidx); j++) {
00300               double currVal = tnAndValsList[j].values[0];
00301               if(currVal < minVal) {
00302                 minVal = currVal;
00303               }
00304               if(currVal > maxVal) {
00305                 maxVal = currVal;
00306               }
00307               sumVal += currVal;
00308             }//end for j 
00309             if((maxVal - minVal) >= thresholdFac) {
00310               //Can't coarsen.
00311               tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + prevFCidx,
00312                   tnAndValsList.begin() + idx);
00313             } else {
00314               //Can coarsen. 
00315               ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> tmpObj;
00316               tmpObj.node = tnAndValsList[prevFCidx].node.getParent();
00317               tmpObj.values[0] = (sumVal/8.0);
00318               tmpList.push_back(tmpObj);
00319               if((prevFCidx + 8) < idx) {
00320                 tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + prevFCidx + 8,
00321                     tnAndValsList.begin() + idx);
00322               }//if to skip equality
00323             }
00324           }//end check fcGap
00325           prevFCidx = idx;
00326         }//end if found FC
00327       }//end for idx
00328 
00329       //Process myLastFC (inclusive) to end
00330       if( (myLastFC >= 0) && (idxOfNextFC >= 0) ) {
00331         int fcGap = inSz + idxOfNextFC - myLastFC;
00332         if(fcGap < 8) {
00333           //Can't coarsen
00334           tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + myLastFC,
00335               tnAndValsList.end());
00336         } else {
00337           //fcGap >= 8
00338           //Can coarsen upto (excluding) (myLastFC + 8)
00339           double minVal = tnAndValsList[myLastFC].values[0];
00340           double maxVal = tnAndValsList[myLastFC].values[0];
00341           double sumVal = 0;
00342           if((myLastFC + 8) > inSz) {
00343             for(int i = myLastFC; i < inSz; i++){
00344               double currVal = tnAndValsList[i].values[0];
00345               if(currVal < minVal) {
00346                 minVal = currVal;
00347               }
00348               if(currVal > maxVal) {
00349                 maxVal = currVal;
00350               }
00351               sumVal += currVal;
00352             }//end for i
00353             for(int i = 0; i < (myLastFC + 8 - inSz); i++){
00354               double currVal = nextOcts[i].values[0];
00355               if(currVal < minVal) {
00356                 minVal = currVal;
00357               }
00358               if(currVal > maxVal) {
00359                 maxVal = currVal;
00360               }
00361               sumVal += currVal;
00362             }//end for i         
00363           } else {
00364             for(int i = myLastFC; i < (myLastFC + 8); i++){
00365               double currVal = tnAndValsList[i].values[0];
00366               if(currVal < minVal) {
00367                 minVal = currVal;
00368               }
00369               if(currVal > maxVal) {
00370                 maxVal = currVal;
00371               }
00372               sumVal += currVal;
00373             }//end for i
00374           }
00375           if((maxVal - minVal) >= thresholdFac) {
00376             //Can't coarsen
00377             tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + myLastFC,
00378                 tnAndValsList.end());
00379           } else {
00380             //Can coarsen
00381             ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> tmpObj;
00382             tmpObj.node = tnAndValsList[myLastFC].node.getParent();
00383             tmpObj.values[0] = (sumVal/8.0);
00384             tmpList.push_back(tmpObj);
00385             if((myLastFC + 8) < inSz) {
00386               tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + myLastFC + 8,
00387                   tnAndValsList.end());
00388             }
00389           }//end check threshold
00390         }//end check fcGap
00391       } else {
00392         if(myLastFC >= 0) {
00393           //Can coarsen upto (excluding) (myLastFC + 8)
00394           double minVal = tnAndValsList[myLastFC].values[0];
00395           double maxVal = tnAndValsList[myLastFC].values[0];
00396           double sumVal = 0;
00397           if((myLastFC + 8) > inSz) {
00398             for(int i = myLastFC; i < inSz; i++){
00399               double currVal = tnAndValsList[i].values[0];
00400               if(currVal < minVal) {
00401                 minVal = currVal;
00402               }
00403               if(currVal > maxVal) {
00404                 maxVal = currVal;
00405               }
00406               sumVal += currVal;
00407             }//end for i
00408             if(rank < (npesCurr - 1)) {
00409               for(int i = 0; i < (myLastFC + 8 - inSz); i++){
00410                 double currVal = nextOcts[i].values[0];
00411                 if(currVal < minVal) {
00412                   minVal = currVal;
00413                 }
00414                 if(currVal > maxVal) {
00415                   maxVal = currVal;
00416                 }
00417                 sumVal += currVal;
00418               }//end for i         
00419             }//end if last proc
00420           } else {
00421             for(int i = myLastFC; i < (myLastFC + 8); i++){
00422               double currVal = tnAndValsList[i].values[0];
00423               if(currVal < minVal) {
00424                 minVal = currVal;
00425               }
00426               if(currVal > maxVal) {
00427                 maxVal = currVal;
00428               }
00429               sumVal += currVal;
00430             }//end for i
00431           } 
00432           if((maxVal - minVal) >= thresholdFac) {
00433             //Can't coarsen
00434             tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + myLastFC,
00435                 tnAndValsList.end());
00436           } else {
00437             //Can coarsen
00438             ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> tmpObj;
00439             tmpObj.node = tnAndValsList[myLastFC].node.getParent();
00440             tmpObj.values[0] = (sumVal/8.0);
00441             tmpList.push_back(tmpObj);
00442             if((myLastFC + 8) < inSz) {
00443               tmpList.insert(tmpList.end(), tnAndValsList.begin() + myLastFC + 8,
00444                   tnAndValsList.end());
00445             }
00446           }
00447         } else {
00448           //This case is the same as myFirstFC < 0 and it has been taken care
00449           //of earlier. 
00450         }
00451       }
00452 
00453       DendroIntL outSz = tmpList.size();
00454       DendroIntL globOutSize;
00455       par::Mpi_Allreduce<DendroIntL>(&outSz, &globOutSize, 1, MPI_SUM, commCurr);
00456 
00457       if(globOutSize == globInSize) {
00458         repeatLoop = false;
00459       }
00460 
00461       if(globOutSize < MIN_GRAIN_SIZE) {
00462         repeatLoop = false; 
00463       }
00464 
00465       //prepare for next iteration...
00466       globInSize = globOutSize;
00467       tnAndValsList = tmpList;
00468       tmpList.clear();
00469 
00470       if(globInSize < (MIN_GRAIN_SIZE*npesCurr)) {
00471         int splittingSize = (globInSize/MIN_GRAIN_SIZE); 
00472         if(splittingSize == 0) {
00473           splittingSize = 1; 
00474         }
00475 
00476         unsigned int avgLoad = (globInSize/splittingSize);
00477         int leftOvers = (globInSize - (splittingSize*avgLoad));
00478 
00479         if(rank >= splittingSize) {
00480           par::scatterValues<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, tmpList, 0, commCurr);
00481         }else if(rank < leftOvers) {
00482           par::scatterValues<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, tmpList, (avgLoad + 1), commCurr);
00483         }else {
00484           par::scatterValues<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, tmpList, avgLoad, commCurr);
00485         }
00486         tnAndValsList = tmpList;
00487         tmpList.clear();
00488 
00489         MPI_Comm newComm;
00490         par::splitCommUsingSplittingRank(splittingSize, &newComm, commCurr);
00491         commCurr = newComm;
00492         npesCurr = splittingSize;
00493 
00494         if(rank >= splittingSize) {
00495           repeatLoop = false;
00496         }
00497       } else {
00498         par::partitionW<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 1> >(tnAndValsList, NULL, commCurr);
00499       } //end if splitting comm
00500 
00501     }//end while
00502 
00503     linOct.clear();
00504     for(int i = 0; i < tnAndValsList.size(); i++) {
00505       linOct.push_back(tnAndValsList[i].node);
00506     }//end for i
00507 
00508     PROF_RG2O_END
00509   }//end function

00511   //New Implementation. Written on April 20, 2008
00512   int completeOctree(const std::vector<TreeNode > & inp,
00513       std::vector<TreeNode > & out, 
00514       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth, bool isUnique,
00515       bool isSorted, bool assertNoEmptyProcs, MPI_Comm comm) {
00516 
00517     PROF_N2O_BEGIN
00518 
00519       TreeNode root (dim, maxDepth);
00520 
00521     int size;
00522     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00523 
00524     if(size == 1) {
00525       completeSubtree(root, inp, out, dim, maxDepth, isUnique, isSorted);
00526       PROF_N2O_END
00527     }//end single proc case     
00528 
00529     out = inp;
00530 
00531     //Sort and remove duplicate leaves.
00532     if (!isUnique) {
00533       par::removeDuplicates<ot::TreeNode>(out, isSorted, comm);
00534     } else if (!isSorted) {
00535       std::vector<TreeNode> tmpOut;
00536       par::sampleSort<ot::TreeNode>(out, tmpOut,comm); 
00537       out = tmpOut;
00538       tmpOut.clear();
00539     }
00540 
00541     //Remove empty processors...    
00542     MPI_Comm   new_comm;
00543     // quick and dirty fix to avoid repetetive creation of communicators (which would exhaust MPI resources)
00544     if(true /* assertNoEmptyProcs */) {
00545       new_comm = comm;
00546       assert(!out.empty());
00547     } else {
00548       par::splitComm2way(out.empty(), &new_comm, comm);
00549     }
00550 
00551     if(!(out.empty())) {        
00552       int new_rank, new_size; 
00553 
00554       MPI_Comm_rank (new_comm, &new_rank);
00555       MPI_Comm_size (new_comm, &new_size);
00556 
00557       MPI_Request requestSend;    
00558       MPI_Request requestRecv;
00559 
00560       ot::TreeNode begBuf;
00561       ot::TreeNode lastElem;
00562 
00563       if(new_rank) {
00564         //Recv
00565         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::TreeNode>(&begBuf, 1, (new_rank-1) , 1, new_comm, &requestRecv);
00566       }//end if not P0
00567 
00568       if (new_rank < (new_size-1)) {
00569         lastElem = out[out.size() - 1];
00570         //Send
00571         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::TreeNode>(&lastElem, 1, (new_rank+1), 1, new_comm, &requestSend);
00572       }//end if not PN 
00573 
00574 
00575       //Add missing corners to complete the region.
00576       //Add the first corner leaf on the first processor.
00577       if (new_rank == 0) {
00578         ot::TreeNode minCorner(0,0,0,maxDepth,dim,maxDepth);
00579 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00580         assert(areComparable(out[0], minCorner));
00581 #endif
00582         if ( (out[0] != minCorner) && (!out[0].isAncestor(minCorner)) ) {
00583           ot::TreeNode ncaTmp = getNCA(out[0],minCorner);
00584           std::vector<ot::TreeNode>  kids;
00585           ncaTmp.addChildren(kids);
00586           out.insert(out.begin(),kids[0]);
00587           kids.clear();
00588         }//end if
00589       }//end if
00590 
00591       //Add the last corner leaf on the last processor.
00592       if (new_rank == (new_size-1) ) {
00593         ot::TreeNode maxCorner(((1u << maxDepth)-1),
00594             ((1u << maxDepth)-1),((1u << maxDepth)-1),maxDepth,dim,maxDepth);
00595 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00596         assert(areComparable(out[out.size()-1], maxCorner));
00597 #endif
00598         if ( (out[out.size()-1] != maxCorner) && 
00599             (!out[out.size()-1].isAncestor(maxCorner)) ) {
00600           ot::TreeNode ncaTmp =  getNCA(out[out.size()-1],maxCorner);
00601           std::vector<ot::TreeNode> kids;
00602           ncaTmp.addChildren(kids);
00603           out.insert(out.end(),kids[(1 << dim)-1]);
00604           kids.clear();
00605         }//end if
00606       }//end if
00607 
00608       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpList;
00609       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (out.size()-1); i++) {
00610 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00611         assert(areComparable(out[i], out[i+1]));
00612 #endif
00613         if(out[i].isAncestor(out[i+1])) {
00614           appendCompleteRegion(out[i], out[i+1], tmpList, false, false);
00615         } else {
00616           appendCompleteRegion(out[i], out[i+1], tmpList, true, false);
00617         }
00618       }//end for i
00619 
00620       //Only the last processor adds the last element. All the other processors would have 
00621       //sent it to the next processor, which will add it if it is not an ancestor of 
00622       //the first element on that processor
00623       if(new_rank == (new_size - 1) ) {
00624         tmpList.push_back(out[out.size() - 1]);
00625       }
00626 
00627       if(new_rank) {
00628         MPI_Status statusWait;
00629         MPI_Wait(&requestRecv, &statusWait);
00630 
00631         std::vector<ot::TreeNode> begList;
00632 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00633         assert(areComparable(begBuf, out[0]));
00634 #endif
00635         if(begBuf.isAncestor(out[0])) {
00636           appendCompleteRegion(begBuf, out[0], begList, false, false);
00637         } else {
00638           appendCompleteRegion(begBuf, out[0], begList, true, false);
00639         }
00640         out = begList;
00641         begList.clear();
00642         out.insert(out.end(), tmpList.begin(), tmpList.end());
00643       } else {
00644         out = tmpList;
00645       }
00646 
00647       tmpList.clear();
00648 
00649       if(new_rank < (new_size-1)) {
00650         MPI_Status statusWait;
00651         MPI_Wait(&requestSend, &statusWait);
00652       }
00653 
00654     } //out not empty
00655 
00656 
00657     PROF_N2O_END
00658 
00659   }//end function
00660 
00661   //New Implementation. Written on April 19, 2008
00662   int completeSubtree(TreeNode block, const std::vector<TreeNode > & inp, std::vector<TreeNode > & out,
00663       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth, bool isUnique, bool isSorted) {
00664 
00665     PROF_N2O_SEQ_BEGIN
00666 
00667       out = inp;
00668     //Sort and remove duplicate leaves.
00669     if (!isUnique) {
00670       seq::makeVectorUnique<TreeNode>(out, isSorted) ;
00671     } else if (!isSorted) {
00672       sort(out.begin(),out.end());
00673     }
00674 
00675     if (!out.empty()) {
00676       //Add missing corners to complete the region.
00677       //Add the first corner .
00678       ot::TreeNode minCorner = block.getDFD();
00679 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00680       assert(areComparable(out[0], minCorner));
00681 #endif
00682       if ( (out[0] != minCorner) && (!out[0].isAncestor(minCorner)) ) {
00683         ot::TreeNode ncaTmp = getNCA(out[0],minCorner);
00684         std::vector<ot::TreeNode> kids;
00685         ncaTmp.addChildren(kids);
00686         out.insert(out.begin(),kids[0]);
00687         kids.clear();
00688       }//end if
00689 
00690       //Add the last corner.
00691       ot::TreeNode maxCorner = block.getDLD();
00692 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00693       assert(areComparable(out[out.size()-1], maxCorner));
00694 #endif
00695       if ( (out[out.size()-1] != maxCorner) && (!out[out.size()-1].isAncestor(maxCorner)) ) {
00696         ot::TreeNode ncaTmp = getNCA(out[out.size()-1],maxCorner);
00697         std::vector<ot::TreeNode> kids;
00698         ncaTmp.addChildren(kids);
00699         out.insert(out.end(),kids[(1 << dim)-1]);
00700         kids.clear();
00701       }//end if
00702 
00703       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpList;
00704       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (out.size()-1); i++) {
00705 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00706         assert(areComparable(out[i], out[i+1]));
00707 #endif
00708         if(out[i].isAncestor(out[i+1])) {
00709           appendCompleteRegion(out[i], out[i+1], tmpList, false, false);
00710         } else {
00711           appendCompleteRegion(out[i], out[i+1], tmpList, true, false);
00712         }
00713       }//end for i
00714 
00715       tmpList.push_back(out[out.size() - 1]);
00716 
00717       out = tmpList;
00718       tmpList.clear();
00719     }//end if out empty
00720 
00721     PROF_N2O_SEQ_END
00722 
00723   }//end function
00724 
00725   int points2Octree(std::vector<double>& pts, double * gLens, std::vector<TreeNode> & nodes,
00726       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth, unsigned int maxNumPts, MPI_Comm comm ) {
00727 
00728     PROF_P2O_BEGIN
00729 
00730       int size;
00731     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00732 
00733     //Sequential...
00734     if (size == 1) {
00735       points2OctreeSeq(pts, gLens, nodes, dim, maxDepth, maxNumPts); 
00736       PROF_P2O_END
00737     }//end if sequential
00738 
00739     int rank;
00740     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00741 
00742     TreeNode root (dim, maxDepth);
00743 
00744     if (maxDepth == 0) {
00745       if (!rank) {
00746         nodes.resize(1);
00747         nodes[0] = root;
00748       } else {
00749         nodes.resize(0);
00750       }
00751       PROF_P2O_END
00752     }
00753 
00754     unsigned int ptsLen = pts.size();
00755     assert( (dim == 1) || (dim == 2) || (dim == 3 ));
00756     assert( (ptsLen%dim) == 0);
00757 
00758     DendroIntL numNodes = (ptsLen/dim);
00759 
00760     DendroIntL totSize;
00761     par::Mpi_Allreduce<DendroIntL>(&numNodes, &totSize, 1, MPI_SUM, comm);
00762 
00763     if (totSize <= static_cast<DendroIntL>(maxNumPts)) {
00764       if (!rank) {
00765         nodes.resize(1);
00766         nodes[0] = root;
00767       } else {
00768         nodes.resize(0);
00769       }//end if-else
00770       PROF_P2O_END
00771     }//end if
00772 
00773     //Tackle small problems separately....
00774     //min Grain size = 1000 
00775     // for now, we shall turn this feature off (since it is a hassle for FMM code)
00776     const DendroIntL THOUSAND = 1;
00777     if (totSize < (THOUSAND*size)) {
00778       int splittingSize = (totSize/THOUSAND); 
00779 
00780       if(splittingSize == 0) {
00781         splittingSize = 1; 
00782       }
00783 
00784       unsigned int avgLoad = (totSize/splittingSize);
00785       int leftOvers = (totSize - (splittingSize*avgLoad));
00786 
00787       std::vector<double> tmpPts;
00788       if(rank >= splittingSize) {
00789         par::scatterValues<double>(pts, tmpPts, 0, comm);
00790       }else if(rank < leftOvers) {
00791         par::scatterValues<double>(pts, tmpPts, (dim*(avgLoad+1)), comm);
00792       }else {
00793         par::scatterValues<double>(pts, tmpPts, (dim*avgLoad), comm);
00794       }
00795       pts.clear();
00796 
00797       MPI_Comm newComm;
00798       par::splitCommUsingSplittingRank(splittingSize, &newComm, comm);
00799 
00800 #ifndef __SILENT_MODE__
00801       if(!rank) {
00802         std::cout<<"Input to p2o is small ("<<totSize
00803           <<"). npes = "<<size<<" Splitting Comm. "<<std::endl;
00804       }
00805 #endif
00806 
00807       if(rank < splittingSize) {
00808         points2Octree(tmpPts, gLens, nodes, dim, maxDepth, maxNumPts, newComm); 
00809       }
00810       tmpPts.clear();
00811 
00812       PROF_P2O_END
00813     }//reduce procs for small problems
00814 
00815     //Tackle large problems.... 
00816 
00817     nodes.resize(numNodes);
00818 
00819     for (DendroIntL i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) {
00820       //The constructor will ignore unnecessary arguments (for lower
00821       //dimensions).
00822       unsigned int px = (unsigned int)(pts[i*dim]*((double)(1u << maxDepth))/(gLens[0]));
00823       unsigned int py, pz = 0;
00824       if(dim > 1) {
00825         py = (unsigned int)(pts[(i*dim)+1]*((double)(1u << maxDepth))/gLens[1]);
00826         if(dim > 2) {
00827           pz = (unsigned int)(pts[(i*dim)+2]*((double)(1u << maxDepth))/gLens[2]);
00828         }
00829       }
00830       nodes[i] = TreeNode(px, py, pz, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth);
00831     }//end for
00832 
00833     pts.clear(); 
00834 
00835     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpNodes ;
00836 
00837     //Sort nodes (pts.) and partition them.
00838     par::sampleSort<ot::TreeNode>(nodes, tmpNodes, comm); 
00839     nodes = tmpNodes;
00840     tmpNodes.clear();
00841 
00842     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> leaves;
00843     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> minsAllBlocks;
00844 
00845     blockPartStage1_p2o(nodes, leaves, dim, maxDepth, comm);
00846     blockPartStage2_p2o(nodes, leaves, minsAllBlocks, dim, maxDepth, comm);
00847     //leaves will be sorted.
00848 
00849     p2oLocal(nodes, leaves, maxNumPts, dim, maxDepth);
00850 
00851     PROF_P2O_END
00852 
00853   }//end function
00854 
00855   //Added on April 19, 2008
00856   int points2OctreeSeq(std::vector<double>& pts, double * gLens, std::vector<TreeNode> & nodes,
00857       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth, unsigned int maxNumPts) {
00858 
00859     PROF_P2O_SEQ_BEGIN
00860 
00861       if (maxDepth == 0) {    
00862         nodes.resize(1);
00863         nodes[0] = TreeNode(dim,maxDepth);
00864         PROF_P2O_SEQ_END
00865       }
00866 
00867     unsigned int ptsLen = pts.size();
00868     assert( (dim == 1) || (dim == 2) || (dim == 3 ));
00869     assert( (ptsLen%dim) == 0);
00870 
00871     TreeNode root (dim,maxDepth);
00872     unsigned int numNodes = ptsLen/dim;
00873     nodes.resize(numNodes);
00874 
00875     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) {
00876       //The constructor will ignore unnecessary arguments (for lower
00877       //dimensions).
00878       unsigned int px = (unsigned int)(pts[i*dim]*((double)(1u << maxDepth))/(gLens[0]));
00879       unsigned int py, pz = 0;
00880       if(dim > 1) {
00881         py = (unsigned int)(pts[(i*dim)+1]*((double)(1u << maxDepth))/gLens[1]);
00882         if(dim > 2) {
00883           pz = (unsigned int)(pts[(i*dim)+2]*((double)(1u << maxDepth))/gLens[2]);
00884         }
00885       }
00886       nodes[i] = TreeNode(px, py, pz, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth);
00887     }//end for
00888 
00889     pts.clear(); 
00890 
00891     unsigned int totSize = nodes.size();
00892 
00893     if (totSize <= maxNumPts) {
00894       nodes.resize(1);
00895       nodes[0] = root;
00896       PROF_P2O_SEQ_END
00897     }//end if
00898 
00899     //Sort nodes (pts.) and partition them.  
00900     sort(nodes.begin(), nodes.end());
00901 
00902     std::vector<TreeNode> leaves;
00903     leaves.push_back(root);
00904 
00905     p2oLocal(nodes, leaves, maxNumPts, dim, maxDepth);
00906 
00907     PROF_P2O_SEQ_END
00908 
00909   }//end function
00910 
00911   int p2oLocal(std::vector<TreeNode> & nodes, std::vector<TreeNode>& leaves,
00912       unsigned int maxNumPts, unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00913     PROF_P2O_LOCAL_BEGIN
00914 
00915       std::vector<TreeNode> nodesDup = nodes;
00916     nodes.clear();
00917 
00918     std::vector<TreeNode> addList;
00919     std::vector<TreeNode> nodesTmp;
00920 
00921     std::vector<TreeNode> *nodeSrc = &nodes;
00922     std::vector<TreeNode> *nodeDest = &nodesTmp;
00923     std::vector<TreeNode> *leafSrc = &leaves;
00924     std::vector<TreeNode> *leafDest = &addList;
00925 
00926     //The source and destination alternate for each iteration.
00927     do {
00928       //Leaves remain sorted inside this loop!
00929       //Reset all wts to 0.
00930       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < leafSrc->size(); i++) {
00931         (*leafSrc)[i].setWeight(0);
00932       }
00933 
00934       //nodesDup and leaves are both sorted at this point.
00935       unsigned int nextNode = 0;
00936       unsigned int nextPt = 0;
00937       //Some elements of nodesDup are not inside any element in leaves.
00938       //Note, this is different from other similar loops.
00939       //Here, nodesDup is merely  a counter and remains unchanged for all
00940       //outer do-while iterations, if a box had less than maxNumpts, it will
00941       //be removed from leaves and placed in nodeDest. However, all its
00942       //decendants in nodesDup still remain.
00943       //Also, note the first pt. need not be in any block. Hence, there is an
00944       //extra if-else wrapper to skip pts, that lie outside all blocks and
00945       //are lesser than them in the Morton order.
00946       while (nextPt < nodesDup.size()) {
00947         if (nodesDup[nextPt] >= (*leafSrc)[nextNode]) {
00948 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00949           assert(areComparable((*leafSrc)[nextNode], nodesDup[nextPt]));
00950 #endif
00951           if (((*leafSrc)[nextNode].isAncestor(nodesDup[nextPt])) ||
00952               ((*leafSrc)[nextNode] == nodesDup[nextPt])) {
00953             (*leafSrc)[nextNode].addWeight(1);
00954             nextPt++;
00955           } else {
00956             nextNode++;
00957             if (nextNode == leafSrc->size()) {
00958               //Note: No assert(false) here. 
00959               break;
00960             }
00961           }
00962         } else {
00963           nextPt++;
00964         }
00965       }//end while
00966 
00967       leafDest->resize((1 << dim)*(leafSrc->size()));
00968       unsigned int addListSz=0;     
00969       unsigned int nodesPrevSz = nodeSrc->size();
00970       nodeSrc->resize(nodesPrevSz + (leafSrc->size()));
00971       nodeDest->resize(nodeSrc->size());
00972       unsigned int tmpCtr=0;
00973       unsigned int nodesCtr=0;
00974       // int cntX=0;
00975       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < leafSrc->size(); i++) {
00976         if ( ((*leafSrc)[i].getWeight() > maxNumPts) &&
00977             ((*leafSrc)[i].getLevel() < maxDepth) ) {
00978           TreeNode thisNode = (*leafSrc)[i];
00979           std::vector<TreeNode> children;
00980           thisNode.addChildren(children);
00981           for (int ci = 0; ci < (1 << dim); ci++) {
00982             (*leafDest)[addListSz] = children[ci];
00983             addListSz++;
00984           }
00985           children.clear();
00986         } else {
00987           while ((nodesCtr < nodesPrevSz) &&
00988               ((*nodeSrc)[nodesCtr] < (*leafSrc)[i]) ) {
00989             (*nodeDest)[tmpCtr++] = (*nodeSrc)[nodesCtr++];
00990           }
00991           (*nodeDest)[tmpCtr++] = (*leafSrc)[i];
00992         }//end if-else
00993       }//end for i
00994 
00995       for (unsigned int i = nodesCtr; i < nodesPrevSz; i++) {
00996         (*nodeDest)[tmpCtr++] = (*nodeSrc)[i];
00997       }
00998 
00999       leafDest->resize(addListSz);
01000       nodeDest->resize(tmpCtr);
01001 
01002       // swap pointers ...
01003       std::vector<TreeNode> *tmpPtr = nodeSrc;
01004       nodeSrc = nodeDest;
01005       nodeDest = tmpPtr;
01006       tmpPtr = leafSrc;
01007       leafSrc = leafDest;
01008       leafDest = tmpPtr;
01009       leafDest->clear();
01010       nodeDest->clear();  
01011     } while (!leafSrc->empty());
01012 
01013     if ( nodeSrc != &nodes ) {
01014       nodes = nodesTmp;
01015     }
01016     nodesTmp.clear();
01017 
01018     //Reset All weights to 1.
01019     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
01020       nodes[i].setWeight(1);
01021     }
01022 
01023     PROF_P2O_LOCAL_END
01024   }
01025 
01026   //New Implementation. Written on April 19th, 2008
01027   //Both ends are inclusive. The output is sorted.
01028   int appendCompleteRegion(TreeNode first, TreeNode second, 
01029       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& newNodes, bool includeMin, bool includeMax) {
01030 
01031     PROF_COMPLETE_REGION_BEGIN
01032 
01033       unsigned int dim = first.getDim();
01034     unsigned int maxDepth = first.getMaxDepth();
01035 
01036     TreeNode min = ((first < second) ? first : second);
01037 
01038     if(includeMin) {
01039       newNodes.push_back(min);
01040     }
01041 
01042     if (first == second) {
01043       PROF_COMPLETE_REGION_END
01044     }
01045 
01046     TreeNode max = ((first > second) ? first : second);
01047 
01048     //Add nodes > min and < max
01049     TreeNode nca = getNCA(min,max);
01050 
01051     if(min == nca) {
01052       //special case. Top down approach
01053       ot::TreeNode tmpAncestor = min;
01054       bool repeatLoop;
01055       do {
01056         repeatLoop = false;
01057         std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpChildList;
01058         tmpAncestor.addChildren(tmpChildList);
01059         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < tmpChildList.size(); j++) {
01060 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
01061           assert(areComparable(tmpChildList[j], max));
01062 #endif
01063           if( (tmpChildList[j] < max) &&
01064               (!(tmpChildList[j].isAncestor(max))) ) {
01065             newNodes.push_back(tmpChildList[j]);
01066           } else if(tmpChildList[j].isAncestor(max)) {
01067             tmpAncestor = tmpChildList[j];
01068             repeatLoop = true;
01069             break;
01070           } else {
01071             assert(tmpChildList[j] == max);
01072             break;
01073           }
01074         }//end for j
01075       } while (repeatLoop);
01076     } else {
01077       TreeNode currentNode = min;    
01078       while(currentNode > nca) {
01079         TreeNode parentOfCurrent = currentNode.getParent();
01080         std::vector<ot::TreeNode> myBros;
01081         parentOfCurrent.addChildren(myBros);
01082         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < myBros.size(); i++) {
01083 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
01084           assert(areComparable(myBros[i], max));
01085 #endif
01086           if( (myBros[i] > min) &&
01087               (myBros[i] < max) && (!(myBros[i].isAncestor(max))) ) {
01088             //Bottom-up here
01089             newNodes.push_back(myBros[i]);
01090           } else if(myBros[i].isAncestor(max)) {
01091             //Top-down now
01092             //nca will be the parentOfCurrent 
01093             //If myBros[i] is an acestor of max then
01094             //it is automatically > min and < max
01095             //The octants are automatically inserted in
01096             //the sorted order, due to properties of space-filling curves.
01097             ot::TreeNode tmpAncestor = myBros[i];
01098             bool repeatLoop;
01099             do {
01100               repeatLoop = false;
01101               std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpChildList;
01102               tmpAncestor.addChildren(tmpChildList);
01103               for(unsigned int j = 0; j < tmpChildList.size(); j++) {
01104 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
01105                 assert(areComparable(tmpChildList[j], max));
01106 #endif
01107                 if( (tmpChildList[j] < max) &&
01108                     (!(tmpChildList[j].isAncestor(max))) ) {
01109                   newNodes.push_back(tmpChildList[j]);
01110                 } else if(tmpChildList[j].isAncestor(max)) {
01111                   tmpAncestor = tmpChildList[j];
01112                   repeatLoop = true;
01113                   break;
01114                 } else {
01115                   assert(tmpChildList[j] == max);
01116                   break;
01117                 }
01118               }//end for j
01119             } while (repeatLoop);
01120             break;      
01121           }//end select between bottom-up/ top-down
01122         }//end for i            
01123         currentNode = parentOfCurrent;
01124       }//end while      
01125     }//end if special case
01126 
01127     if(includeMax) {
01128       newNodes.push_back(max);
01129     }
01130 
01131     PROF_COMPLETE_REGION_END
01132   }//end function
01133 
01134   /*
01135   //Original Code
01136   //Both ends are inclusive. The output is sorted.
01137   int completeRegion(TreeNode first, TreeNode second, 
01138   std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& newNodes, bool includeMin, bool includeMax) {
01139 
01140   PROF_COMPLETE_REGION_BEGIN
01141 
01142   unsigned int dim = first.getDim();
01143   unsigned int maxDepth = first.getMaxDepth();
01144 
01145   TreeNode min = ( (first < second) ? first : second );
01146   TreeNode max = ( (first > second) ? first : second );
01147 
01148   newNodes.clear();
01149 
01150   if(includeMin) {
01151   newNodes.push_back(min);
01152   }
01153 
01154   if (first == second) {
01155   return 1;
01156   }
01157 
01158   if(includeMax) {
01159   newNodes.push_back(max);
01160   }
01161 
01162 //Add nodes > min and < max
01163 TreeNode nca = getNCA(min,max);
01164 
01165 std::vector<TreeNode> workingNodes;
01166 std::vector<TreeNode> addList;
01167 std::vector<TreeNode> * wSrc = &(workingNodes);
01168 std::vector<TreeNode> * wDest = &(addList);
01169 workingNodes.push_back(nca);
01170 while (!(wSrc->empty())) {
01171 wDest->resize((wSrc->size())*(1 << dim));
01172 unsigned int addListCtr=0;
01173 for (unsigned int k=0;k < wSrc->size();k++) {
01174 if ( ((*wSrc)[k] > min) && ((*wSrc)[k] < max) && 
01175 (!(*wSrc)[k].isAncestor(max)) ) {
01176 newNodes.push_back((*wSrc)[k]);
01177 } else if ((*wSrc)[k].getLevel() < maxDepth) {
01178 if ((*wSrc)[k].isAncestor(min) || (*wSrc)[k].isAncestor(max) ) {
01179 std::vector<TreeNode>  tmpChildren;
01180 (*wSrc)[k].addChildren(tmpChildren);
01181 for (int l=0;l<(1 << dim);l++) {
01182 if (tmpChildren[l]<max) {
01183 (*wDest)[addListCtr++] = tmpChildren[l];
01184 }
01185 }//end for l
01186 tmpChildren.clear();
01187 }
01188 }//end if-else
01189 }//end for k
01190 wDest->resize(addListCtr);
01191 std::vector<TreeNode> * tmpPtr = wSrc;
01192 wSrc = wDest;
01193 wDest = tmpPtr;
01194 }//end while
01195 
01196 sort(newNodes.begin(),newNodes.end());
01197 
01198 PROF_COMPLETE_REGION_END
01199 }//end function
01200 */
01201 
01202 }//end namespace
